You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &curren

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&curren;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a4/index.htm U+000A4].
  * `&curren` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a4/index.htm U+000A4].
